articles.contents:
Put in links to the USNA talk and the ASEE paper.
Also, explain how the categories and tags work.
2022-02-11 USNA Remodeling the mathematics core at USAFA html pdf
2022-02-15 Florida Polytechnic An Engineering-oriented Calculus Core html pdf

articles.title: *MOSAIC Calculus*
articles.contents:
The Project MOSAIC calculus textbook is divided into six blocks and a collection of “manifestations.” Depending on the goals for the course being taught different blocks can be included.
Preface: What is calculus?
Block 1: Introduction to functions and computing
Block 1b: Foundations for modeling
Project: Lessons from Ebola

Block 2: Differentiation
Projects:
How fast does a bicycle go?
How to walk uphill


Block 3: Anti-differentiation and accumulation
Project: Driving with integrals

Block 4: Manifestations
Operations on functions
Interpolation and splines
Optimization and constraint
Probability and evidence
Present and future value
Project: Retirement and after

Mechanics

Block 5: Linear combinations
Project: Least squares and engine scaling

Block 6: Dynamics
Project: Using a model to set policy

Writing for this blog
Keeping track of objectives
